title: Digging for Truth in the Pits of Propaganda: Defusing the News- Portland,Tim Pool, Francis Schaeffer
description:
Well I usually avoid hitting the news of the day, but this seemed like a perfect time to discuss Propaganda. And so I decided to give a How To on handling the fire hose strength stream of disinformation that's been flowing from the mainstream media. And so I spend more than two and a half hours discussing the context of one thirty second clip from Portland, Oregon. My point here is less political than it is practical. No one is innocent of making Propaganda in my eyes. And the worst culprits are seen in the mirrors of those who just have to pass on the latest articles, memes, and screeds. My point: Don't contribute to the unraveling of everything. Remember the humanity of everyone, even those you've been taunted into believing are your enemies. 
.....
HEY! SUPPORT THIS CHANNEL TODAY. My equipment is getting maxed out making these long videos. Please consider a monthly contribution through PayPal to receive extra content and to help me afloat here in Georgia. And if you start today you can get 10 hours worth of extra content immediately. 
Click this... https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=G9LDYMSPZ5RGG
Watch this video for more about our extra content:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nykTp3TziRY

My other YouTube channel is this one: https://www.youtube.com/user/gulagzero 

The Anadromous Life essay site for more in depth ideas: https://theanadromist.wordpress.com/ 

The Gravity From Above site for more artistic ideas involving puppetry, music, dance and other arts. 
https://gravityfromabove.wordpress.com/ 

And to understand more about my life in Georgia check out my Georgian Crossroads channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeFJ6Tm71ieNcjcUb-Trc8g

And if you want to communicate with me use The Anadromous Life Facebook page. https://www.facebook.com/theanadromist/ 
(I don't want to have to make my personal page private because I have too many 'friends'. If it's dialogue you want go there. I'll start 'community' page soon enough if the demand is there.) 

Thanks for watching, more coming soon! 

Meanwhile dig into the Anadromous past. 
From Tbilisi Georgia (Look it up on a map!) 
Swimming Against the Stream
Byrne
#georgefloydprotests #propaganda #Portland
